SweepShape< Vector3 > Class Template Reference

This is the simplest instantiation of the SweepShape template, for sweeping a single point through the space (making a ray). More...

Detailed Description

template<>
class SweepShape< Vector3 >

This is the simplest instantiation of the SweepShape template, for sweeping a single point through the space (making a ray).
